meanings.definition: A device used to maintain very low temperatures
meanings.sent1: The cryostats in the lab keep the samples extremely cold for experiments.
meanings.sent2: Scientists rely on cryostats to preserve delicate materials at freezing temperatures.
meanings.sent3: Why did the cryostats go to the winter party? To chill out!
meanings.sent4: The cryostats stood like icy guardians, protecting the precious contents within.
meanings.sent5: The hum of the cryostats filled the room, a constant reminder of the extreme cold.

meanings.sent1: The lab technicians carefully monitored the cryostats to ensure they were all functioning properly.
meanings.sent2: Several cryostats were lined up in the research facility, each serving a specific purpose.
meanings.sent3: The cryostats gathered for a group photo, posing in their icy glory.
meanings.sent4: The cryostats hummed together in harmony, creating a symphony of cold.
meanings.sent5: Clusters of cryostats dotted the lab like frozen sentinels, standing guard over the scientific equipment.
